title: Christine Lagarde - President of the European Central Bank | LinkedIn
snippet: President of the European Central Bank · Born in Paris in 1956, Christine Lagarde completed high school in Le Havre and attended Holton Arms School in Bethesda (Maryland, United States).

title: Christine Lagarde - Wikipedia
snippet: Lagarde had also served in the Government of France, most prominently as Minister of the Economy, Finance and Industry from 2007 until 2011. She is the first woman to hold each of those posts. Born and raised in Paris, Lagarde graduated from law school at Paris Nanterre University and obtained ...

title: President of the European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: The current president of the European Central Bank is Christine Lagarde, previously the chair and managing director of the International Monetary Fund.
